Package com.epita.creeps.given.json

Class Json

java.lang.Object
com.epita.creeps.given.json.Json
public final class Json extends Object
Utility class for json parsing and serializing.

    • parse

      public static <OBJECT_TYPE> OBJECT_TYPE parse(String json, Class<OBJECT_TYPE> objectType)
      Parses any json to the given type.
      Type Parameters:
      OBJECT_TYPE - the generic type of the type.
      Parameters:
      json - the json to parse.
      objectType - the type to parse to.
      Returns:
      the parsed object.

    • parseReport

      public static <REPORT_TYPE extends Report> REPORT_TYPE parseReport(String jsonReport) throws NoReportException
      Parse the provided report, may throw exceptions if the report is not present.
      Type Parameters:
      REPORT_TYPE - the expected report type.
      Parameters:
      jsonReport - the json string to parseReport.
      Returns:
      the parsed report.
      Throws:
      NoReportException - when a no-report response is present instead of the expected report.
      JsonParsingException - if the opcode is not present, or the json parsing failed at library level.
